title: Emerald Diamond Jadau Haaram - The "Aaradhana" Collection
materials: meticulously crafted with uncut diamonds (Polki/Jadau) and vibrant Zambian Emeralds. Features fine quality pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: A classic four-strand haaram showcasing exquisite Jadau craftsmanship. The central pendant boasts intricate floral and paisley motifs, accented with a central Emerald cut gemstone. Delicate Emerald drops enhance the pendant's elegance. The setting is a blend of traditional pacheli and contemporary prong settings to ensure the diamonds sparkle brilliantly. The neckline features a delicate diamond and emerald accent.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A statement piece for any festive occasion or formal event.
description: This Haaram represents the pinnacle of Hyderabadi Jadau artistry. The use of uncut diamonds and Zambian Emeralds highlights its luxurious appeal. Its heirloom quality ensures it can be treasured for generations. The harmonious blend of traditional design with a contemporary feel makes it a truly unique and timeless piece. Represents prosperity, good luck, and lasting beauty. Durability guaranteed due to the meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality materials.
